name: Cart Racer
description: Get a new gaming experience as a racer in a shopping cart! Play for the brutal and steep Cart Racer. Overcome obstacles in the city, in the sea, in the ancient castle and the snowy mountains!
minimum_requirements: 最低: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 プロセッサー: Dual core CPU @2GHz (Pentium D or better) メモリー: 2 GB RAM グラフィック: Intel HD 4000, GeForce 8800, ATI 1950 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 ストレージ: 1 GB 利用可能 サウンドカード: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible audio device
